price: 41.Ni Rabbow yoo kee yi xaleynaay moominiinih dambi cab, sinam cisab kee galtoh edde soita ayro. (Nabii Ibraahim ama dooqa abbah abem usuk Yallih Qaduwwi kinnim kaah Qaddowtak dumak ten).
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
